name: Shell Game VR
description:
Can you Find the Ball in VR?

Shell Game VR lets you experience a world where you can put your skills to the test. Pass the headset around and challenge your friends!

*When the cups stop moving, focus on one of them (highlighted green) and tap to select it.

Features:
-Google Cardboard-powered stereoscopic rendering and head-tracking for mobile VR.
-Exciting Gameplay -- don't take your eyes off the ball!
-Feel the Heat -- a relaxing beach complete with soothing waves and sunshine.

Learn more about Google Cardboard today!
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/

Works with any stereoscopic headset with a built-in accelerometer.
